levelName.name: The Bros Are Back in Town

levels.briefDescription: The Boys Are Back in Town music level.
levels.description: In March of 1976, the Irish hard rock band Thin Lizzy released their sixth studio album, Jailbreak. This album included the single "The Boys Are Back in Town", which went on to become Thin Lizzy's biggest US hit and won the 1976 NME Award for Best Single.                        In August of 2022, The Mario Maker Celebration Project released an announcement trailer. That trailer included throwaway line referencing Thin Lizzy. This is the level that was made because of that throwaway line.
levels.makerDescription: DTSpies is still livin' downtown, drivin' all the old men crazy.

levels.briefDescription: Dodge peepas that create circles and waves.
levels.description: Wander into the warehouse to witness the weird white whirling wheels!
levels.makerDescription: Kaito likes to create traditional levels with interesting gimmicks. Some of his levels contain looping music, mostly using background music from Kirby series.

levels.briefDescription: Doing nice donut block jumps
levels.description: Who would have thought that Bumpers — who have all right to be called Donut Blocks — and claws can synergize so well? This unusual duo will give you a boost to fly over obstacles and reach new areas to rise up high into the sky.
levels.makerDescription: Although he's lost quite a lot of his passion for Mario Maker 2 — definitely having overdosed on it the first year after it's release — Tino is still a maker you can count on to contribute when it’s time for the anniversary event. A random fun fact about him (as response to a certain person's persistence that he should tell more about himself): Tino once solved a Rubik's cube in under a minute and 10 seconds.

levels.briefDescription: Pressure plate driven on/off contraption puzzles
levels.description: Grakowsky thought, "wouldn't it be cool to have a button contraption, like in Portal? I bet there'd be lots of applications!" Being inspired, he made one. Then, Nabuz broke it and made a better one. Thanks Nabuz!
levels.makerDescription: Grakowsky still needs puzzles or he'll explode.

levels.briefDescription: P Ballooning inside a cage of cannonballs moving with the autoscroll. The cage is the shape of a balloon. Avoiding obstacles.
levels.description: Float around the kingdom in your cannonballoon.
levels.makerDescription: Power Balloon aficionado.

levels.briefDescription: Mushroom Trampoline with lag
levels.description: Description is now loading... Please wait.
levels.makerDescription: Luwuka is out of the basement once again and now happy because 7YMM is here! Wait...

levels.briefDescription: Koopas, brick blocks, and goombas. Traditional
levels.description: Invisible goomba sleepin' in your bed... Who you gonna call?
levels.makerDescription: Some people think we're a pair of American scientists, but we're actually Grakowsky's grandson. He was as surprised as we were. Makes all level types, but we are not responsible for the steaming hot garbage made by our evil twin living in Japan. Kappa

levels.briefDescription: A very beginner friendly troll level
levels.description: Simple, introductory troll level for players that aren't familiar with the genre. Have fun!
levels.makerDescription: I'm mostly known as the "simple trolls" creator, but you'll find a great variety of levels on my profile. While my trolls might trick and bamboozle you - my main goal is to put a smile on your face.

levelName.name: FIFAnts アリヘイサッカーフィーバー

levels.briefDescription: The level of ants and ironballs
levels.description: Ants like soccer. But they don't know the rules.
levels.makerDescription: I have been making courses for about three years. I especially like gimmicks and beautiful art that you don't see very often elsewhere.

levels.briefDescription: Geometry Dash like platformer where the player is stuck between two blasters in clowncars
levels.description: Mario must prove his worth as the Jumpman.
levels.makerDescription: Mr Sparky (or MrElectrodude) came out of his shell to make a level for this year's anniversary.

levels.briefDescription: Precision level; exploring abandoned mining facility which leads to an ice cave
levels.description: Explore an old mining facility that has been out of commission for decades and enter the ice cave within.
levels.makerDescription: Precision player and maker.

levels.briefDescription: Fishbone stealth level as a P-balloon Mario
levels.description: Bone Bass Bandits have stolen your precious mushrooms. Sneak into their base undetected and retrieve the stolen delicacies. However, avoid eating them all on the spot as bloating might make it challenging to escape... oh, too late.
levels.makerDescription: Mario is a platforming game? Not on Terimas' watch! He is a level maker who specializes in puzzles and all sorts of unconventional levels.

levels.briefDescription: Complex link dungeon involving changing the central pillar's height. Red coins required.
levels.description: Navigate a winding link dungeon by changing the height of a central pillar.
levels.makerDescription: Having started out his SMM2 journey making troll levels, 3good has branched out to making various types of puzzles over time as well. Also, don't tell anyone, but he's actually 4good6you, he's just modest.

levels.briefDescription: Fling yourself sky-high on the catapulting cannons within the airship…
levels.description: Fling yourself sky-high on the catapulting cannons within the airship…
levels.makerDescription: MakerName: Wiltini. Country/Region: Canada. LevelTypes: Gimmick/Platforming. Event: First. Height: Unspecified.

levels.briefDescription: Music level based around SMB2 powerup
levels.description: Let's make the best of the situation. Before I finally go insane.
levels.makerDescription: Smpiano makes some great music. Fehwul is in charge of not letting you listen to all of it.

levels.briefDescription: Use stars to walk safely on munchers in clouds
levels.description: Eat a mass of incandescent gas to prevent any self harm from walking on cloud-bound munchers.
levels.makerDescription: Pax has currently achieved C-list celebrity status in the Mario community, but this hasn't provided the satisfaction he desired. He's currently trying to slide back to X-list for the pure and wholesome reason that X marks the spot.

levels.briefDescription: Great Adventure in the Great Palace with Looping Music!
levels.description: What makes the desert beautiful, is that somewhere it hides treasures. #TM
levels.makerDescription: Hello! I'm WBC. This time, I wanted to make a level by including the Master Sword. Solve Puzzles and Defeat Enemies in the Great Palace to Earn Rewards! Hope you enjoy!

levels.briefDescription: Stacked Boos chase you and react to direction detection!
levels.description: Welcome, new employees, to Boogie Boolevard, the hottest fitness center for boo-kind since 1988! Here in the Boolevard, we teach boos to boogie to the same direction as their Direction Jockey (DJ). Take pride in knowing that your work as a DJ is helping these boos shed pounds and avoid an early grave (for the second time). Just remember the golden rule: these boos are on a strict diet, so they're desperate to indulge. You look like a tasty morsel, so please don't feed the boos, you'll ruin all their hard work with a massive calorie infusion!
levels.makerDescription:
Theorymon is a nerd who plays way too much Mario, competitive Pokemon, and Touhou, while also appreciating astrophysics and hiking. He loves to make players question the fundamentals of Mario with his courses in particular! Finally, he'd like to give special thanks for choo choo for vastly improving the pixel art for this course, and nickabuz and geitje for working on the mechanisms!
This course is dedicated to Theorymon's cat, Rollie, who sadly passed away this week. He loved to watch Mario.

levels.briefDescription: Various spring contraptions repeatedly bounce thwomps off of walls
levels.description: Thwart the throng of threatening thwomps that thunderously thwack things.
levels.makerDescription: RadicalR is a 15 year old maker from the US of A who has loved Mario for about as long as he can remember. Despite being basically unknown in the MM2 community, he is a somewhat versatile maker who loves building all kinds of levels, particularly platformers with unique gimmicks. YMM is what initially sparked him to start improving his levels and he is honored to be participating in its successor alongside some of his favorite makers.

levels.briefDescription: Mario is in a crumbeling ghost house and breaks trough walls and floors  with red POWs
levels.description: This house had its prime time. But now, after years with no one living in it (except some ghosts), it's ready to bite the dust. Each step will make it crumble more and may release an unwanted chain reaction. Watch your step!
levels.makerDescription: GreenStarC is known for his gimmick-driven style of level building, all about finding a gimmick and improving it to the next level.

levels.briefDescription: Link course, like traditional an NES Zelda dungeon with puzzles and boss
levels.description: For the 7th year celebration Pinktops wanted to pay homage to Chicago, his home town, but his deep dish pizza and Oprah themed troll course was rejected by the judges, he made this windy Zelda course instead.
levels.makerDescription: Pinktops uses advanced mechanics to make memorable traditional courses that are, above all else, fun! AKA "Pink Triceratops" in the maker community, he is creative, cretaceous, and has three horns... which is 3x better than a unicorn.

levels.briefDescription: Kicking bone buckets into brick blocks
levels.description: bones break bricks :O
levels.makerDescription: BigRedBoy AKA "The Large Crimson Lad" is just some guy that's really big and really really red. Also, don't make him mad 'cause he bites. Furthermore, don't feed him anything cause he'll just want more food, and if you don't give him more food he'll get mad and then start biting. In conclusion, BigRedBoy's a nice guy.

levels.briefDescription: on off switches change skipsqueakcolors
levels.description: Help your cute mouse friends show their true colors. PridePog
levels.makerDescription: MangMang69 was Mang all along! D:

levels.briefDescription: Getting over it Looping Music
levels.description: There's no need to fear this 'Getting Over It' style level. We reduced the frustration to make way for plenty of secrets, shortcuts, and looping music from the indy cult classic CaveStory.
levels.makerDescription: “TempestFunk was told to write a description of himself for this section, but he’s better at making levels than he is writing descriptions, so now he’s just typing things hoping that eventually he’ll successfully fill up all the required spa”

levels.briefDescription: SMB2 fishbone/twister flight interactions
levels.description: Fly through the air on fast-paced fishbones! Harness the power of the SMB2 mushroom to turn foe into friend!
levels.makerDescription: Chichiri is known in the community for his troll levels, but decided to bring a piece of troll tech into the platforming world!

levels.briefDescription: A link puzzle level using the sheild to deflect spikeballs
levels.description: A cave-in has Link trapped in a cave filled with the ferocious spike mites. Though they may be sharp and beastly, can he use them to carve a way out?
levels.makerDescription: Nexar is a maker who plays maker games and makes game to play

levels.briefDescription: A level themed around spiketops/spinies in clouds and the various things you can do with them.
levels.description: Climb your way up to the Royal Cloud Palace, maneuver your way through the Royal Guard's defenses, and engage in combat with the King of Clouds himself!
levels.makerDescription: Zach Divine is a maker who enjoys making semi-traditional levels accompanied by custom boss fights, and he's currently working on his own super world of them!  He wishes you good luck in your quest to conqueor the Domain of the Cloud Army!

levels.briefDescription: The Swamp is Cursed. Every Night a path appears and dissapears again
levels.description: An old legend tells of an enchanted swamp. But even the elders aren't sure which story about it is true. Some say that there is a path open for a true hero, and that the swamp reveals its secret. Others say the swamp tests anyone who dares to enter it. Others say the swamp is cursed and anyone who enters it is said to see a path that disappears a short time later. In the end, your job is to visit the swamp and find out which story is true and fill in the gap in the history books of the ancients.
levels.makerDescription: Silen♰Moon is a 21-year-old, non-satanic goth boy otaku from south west Germany. He enjoys playing video games like The Elder Scrolls series, The Legend of Zelda but also Splatoon 3. Silent aka Mica loves reading manga and watching anime. He also enjoys drawing and writing stories in his free time. But he also likes to walk his husky. Super Mario Maker 2 is the perfect place to unleash his creative streak. Best examples are "Double Flower Shooter" and "Who is the Composer". But he also loves to play cool and creative levels from other makers.

levels.briefDescription: nsmbu exploration and walljumping level that has a rotating checkpoint.
levels.description: Creaking corridors and cobwebbed corners hide a wealth of Wigglers, and a plethora of Pokeys. Toad heartily enters harrowing wormeaten hallways for an exploratory expedition through perilous puzzle-platforming pathways. Will he find secret passages filled with balloons, or plummet to his death down darkened pits?
levels.makerDescription: Rybonez has been making levels since the drop of SMM1. He prefers to build Super Expert platformers that require more than a little bit of consideration while playing through the first time, but become more natural with each section's playthrough. Truly satisfying setups with a few "Ah-ha!" moments are really what he feels are the necessary elements of a great level...but a touch of puzzly precision also never hurts.

levels.briefDescription: Spike balls platforming :)
levels.description: This spiky train doesn't stop, so make sure you hitch a ride!
levels.makerDescription: Hi! I'm Sacha, a 15 years old nerd who loves coding, making music, and creating some epic Mario Maker levels :)

levels.briefDescription: Sequence of pen and paper style logic puzzles inspired by the witness
levels.description: On a distant island that appears on no map a mysterious block, later called the Rosetta block, was found. On the Rosetta block there were mysterious engravings that seemed to form some sort of a cryptic code. Ancient legends say that those who can decipher the code of the block may witness its deepest secrets...
levels.makerDescription: Rubenscube isn't really a cube, that's just his family name. He is actually a hexagonal prism.

levels.briefDescription: A troll level collab themed around Goombas
levels.description: If you're not playing this level, you're gonna turn into a Goomba!
levels.makerDescription: Wilfred, Stevo, BearWare, Soupbowl, Daftlife, Bedcliff, Foggles, Major, Marble and B0X. We all make troll levels except for Bedcliff but don't worry, he's getting there.

levels.briefDescription: Waluigi Time!
levels.description: I dedicate this level to everyone who helped me! (Making looping music) #TM
levels.makerDescription: I dedicate this level to all the people around the world who have helped me. Thank you very much everyone. Good luck to you always.

levels.briefDescription: Racing along side a banzai bill while you clear its path and you're own using the cannon box and catbell powerups.
levels.description: Dash through this dangerous castle full of blasters, banzais, cannons, and... cats? Whatever you do, don't lose your banzai buddy. He's your only ticket to escaping this deadly fortress, which may be the only proper use of the shooter level tag.
levels.makerDescription: Hey! I'm PocketLint (or Lint, or Dr. Lint, or Sir Pocket of the Lint Trap)! I'm a traditional level maker, contest enthusiast, and hider of ninja coins. I'm also incredibly jealous of DuffyWeber's voice. No one tell him.

levels.briefDescription: A "puzzleformer" using nerfed thwomps that you can run on top of and touch from the side
levels.description: Thwomps are in tight spots, so feel free to use them to your financial advantage :))
levels.makerDescription: Donkeymint incorporated is the leading business at the forefront of donkey production.

levels.briefDescription: Dig clouds and descend, collecting enough coins before time runs out
levels.description: This subterranean shaft is full of riches and heavy fog. Dig into the depths, gather loot, and reach the bottom before your spelunking time is up!
levels.makerDescription: A maker who loves platformers and traditional levels. Samfizz strives to tell stories with fun themes and aesthetics, and appreciates a healthy dose of exploration and secrets.

levels.briefDescription: Lava is floor, but with a twist (collab with Mang)
levels.description: Magma mia! Luwuka and Mang decided to open their (really) hot tub to the public!
levels.makerDescription: Luwuka now happily lives in Mang's basement.

levels.briefDescription: Wall jumps with skipsqueak jump detector
levels.description: Skips says he's the REAL JumpMan! He's got a new challenge for you, & NO powerups!
levels.makerDescription: Been playing MM2 since launch, but haven't uploaded too many levels because I have been working on a Mega Man/Mario hybrid super world, which should be ready soon!

levels.briefDescription: Ride Lakitu Clouds to avoid Grinders & Lava Bubbles in Bowser's trash compactor
levels.description: After being dumped into Bowser's trash compactor, you must surf across the puffs of steam exhaust to avoid being minced and melted!
levels.makerDescription: I'm a traditional level maker with a knack for aesthetics. I try to give all my levels that feeling of Nintendo authenticity. :-)

levels.briefDescription: A crate-companion troll level
levels.description: Boom Boom has stolen your gift for 7MMC! Take it back! (Troll)
levels.makerDescription: "I make dumb stuff." Idk

levels.briefDescription: Gimmick level to utilize stasis rune (on/off+twister) to freeze enemy.
levels.description: To you who set foot in this shrine, I am Angler Wigglar. In the name of Princess Peach, I offer this trial of stasis. ZA WARUDO!
levels.makerDescription: AuraSphere tries to recreate fun gameplay from other video games. After all, Mario Maker is Turing complete, right?

levels.briefDescription: Players have to avoid falling by taking off shoes repeatedly throughout the level.
levels.description: A heavier boot will fall, but if you take it off, it will rise again. Soar high into the sky with infinite jumps!
levels.makerDescription: Magatoro managed to finish to make this level, despite not having enough time to devote to making levels of Mario Maker this year.

levels.briefDescription: A puzzle/escape room utilizing ghosts to convey messages on how to escape.
levels.description: The manor's ghosts have information to give you. Pay attention to them, and they'll help you escape! (Notepad recommended.)
levels.makerDescription: Other than troll levels, Chichiri's favourite level genre are puzzle levels. After making a bunch of one-screen puzzles, Chichiri decided to do something a bit more in-depth.

levels.briefDescription: Platforming level where stumps bounce in and out of lava
levels.description: Stumps bouncing. Lava bubbling. Chomps abound. Don’t let your guard down.
levels.makerDescription: "I like to try my best to make fun levels. Also, uh, words are hard-" lLucer.exe has stopped working

levels.briefDescription: Exploration Platformer with interesting firebar patterns on tracks
levels.description: Don't stare at these fascinating flames for too long or you might get hyponotized by their perplexing patterns. I would like to state that I am not responsible for any dizzyness or nausia experienced when playing this level... probably
levels.makerDescription: My name is samwell, can't think of a description, so here's a haiku

levels.briefDescription: Link water puzzle/platform dungeon
levels.description: Root out intruders that have contaminated the waterworks. Don't forget to use your map and look at the hint panel!
levels.makerDescription: Aegis is just another traditional maker, just play the damn level will ya!

levels.briefDescription: Platformer where you have to ride on parathwomps and stuff
levels.description: Traverse a cave where thwomps are your friends! ...Most of the time.
levels.makerDescription: A 7th grader who makes all kinds of levels and is also very close to getting a silver all-time medal for some reason.

levels.briefDescription: Music level themed around using the bone bucket
levels.description: The drybones shell is your partner for the night time platforming for the song of the forbidden dance.
levels.makerDescription: SM the talking piano recreates good songs in Mario Maker. Fehwul the chillest pirate adds the cool platforming.

levels.briefDescription: Piped piranha plant despawn hijinx. Collab with Kiavik.
levels.description: Lektor and Kiavik can offer you bottomless salad and wings at the Gravlax Garden, the world's first Italo-Norwegian fusion restaurant!
levels.makerDescription: Lektor is some guy who stumbled into 4YMM and somehow ended up being the promo guy. For 7MMC, he collaborates with Kiavik, who apparently had something to do with YMM as well?

levels.briefDescription: Multiplayer Puzzle using screen scroll lock
levels.description: Four friends entered this winter wonderland only to become separated. They can see one another, but a mysterious force will not allow them to join together. Players must figure out the puzzle on their own screen while sharing items and resources in order to escape the Crossroads. 4 players are required. Voice chat is highly recommended to coordinate.
levels.makerDescription: I'm the RenaldoMun. I love to connect people for fun and laughs. Multiplayer levels have become my forte. Grateful for Luqueto's collaboration and inspiring ideas! Big thanks to great multiplayer crew who helped test all these levels, especially CannibalTurtle, RX7man, SaltyPeregrine, Theorymon, and iAreNubcake.

levels.briefDescription: Multiplayer puzzle using scroll stop
levels.description: In this 4 player Versus Mode Puzzle, you have to work together and think outside of the box to find a way out of this haunted mansion.
levels.makerDescription: When Luqueto played Mario Maker 2, he fell in love with the game. This is Luqueto, a guy that loves creative things. From Mario Maker to playing music, from painting to dancing and anything that he can learn and express himself. He had an amazing journey to learn SMM2 Multiplayer in which he and RenaldoMun have worked together and developed very interesting contraptions that wouldn't be possible without help from all lovely play testers that endured all bugs on their levels. Special thanks to Renaldo! They hope you all enjoy the level.

levels.briefDescription: Multiplayer 2v2 Team Troll
levels.description: Bros Vs Toads! With good timing and skill, you can activate trolls to kill the other team in this 2v2 level.  Each kill will count a point (sideways spring) for your team. After both teams get to troll, check scoreboard to find out who won. Winning team will get first shot at the goal. If its a tie....then look out for a mad dash to the end!
levels.makerDescription: Years back, an enormous white cat appeared out of nowhere, devoured all the fish in the lake, and then ran off. He called himself Renaldo Moon. Unfortunately, he had to shorten it for Nintendo to RenaldoMun. Now he spares the fish and only devours Mario lives with multiplayer trolls.

levels.briefDescription: Celeste music level wall conveyorbelts
levels.description: "Gotta climb fast" ~ Madeline 2023
levels.makerDescription: Despite everything, Mang is still Mang.

levels.briefDescription: Bumpers act like on/off switches
levels.description: Mario has stumbled upon the lair of the Nice Donut Blockers. These strange, rubbery beings possess the ability to switch the state of on/off blocks at will. Their sole purpose in life is to guard the various on/off gates within the fortress and prevent intruders from getting to their secret stash of balloons. Honestly though, the Blockers don't seem all that tough... maybe they'll be convinced to let Mario through if he smacks 'em around a bit.
levels.makerDescription: RadicalR is a 16 year old maker who participated in 7MMC and is glad to be back for another year. He likes gimmicks, on/off switches, blue platforms, vertical levels, and bad puns. People tell him he's a contrarian, but he doesn't agree.

levels.briefDescription: Throw boomerang while riding enemies
levels.description: Boomerang level, where you throw boomerangs. Mario Maker is like a boomerang too, I keep throwing it away and it keeps coming back, which is also the plot of my new indie horror movie, "Wowie Zowie".
levels.makerDescription: The celebrity alphabet joke is done, it ran it's course, if you're a fan too bad so sad, send hatemail to Paxsman.

levels.briefDescription: Link dungeon
levels.description: Explore a dungeon that changes its form as you delve deeper. Use the map to navigate your way around and challenge Gloom Boom who lurks in the depths of this lair.
levels.makerDescription: I like devious puzzles, clever contraptions, entity limit shenanigans and perhaps overly complicated levels.

levels.briefDescription: Puzzle-platformer involving cannons
levels.description: Donkeymint Incorporated: manufacturer of top tier Mario Maker levels... but is it all just a cover-up? You sense a much more sinister operation driving the business. After countless unreturned phone calls, emails, and letters, you are finally invited on a tour of the headquarters. When you arrive, no one is there to greet you and the door is locked. You get the feeling no one survives the tour...
levels.makerDescription: Grakowsky loves to make and play puzzles - sometimes platformers too - sometimes puzzle-platformers! He hopes to one day finish his own puzzle game after the sun has finally set over Mario Maker 2.

levels.briefDescription: Blaster walls
levels.description: Command these blaster walls to make your way, or be crushed by their unforgiving wallness.
levels.makerDescription: Donkeymint incorporated is the leading business at the forefront of donkey production.

levels.briefDescription: Wintergatan's Marble Machine music level
levels.description: A tribute to the marvelous 'Marble Machine' by Wintergatan!
levels.makerDescription: Mang let Luwuka out of the basement for a brief moment for this event.

levels.briefDescription: Stuff flies up from the bottom of the screen
levels.description: Levitation: the phenomenon of a person or thing rising into the air by apparently supernatural means.
levels.makerDescription: marc0-pol0 is a maker who likes coming up with new ideas for levels that others may not have seen before. He has an introverted personality, and a passion for creative hobbies. In the real world he's an artist who sells photorealistic pen drawings.

levels.briefDescription: Riding snake blocks
levels.description: Use the mechanical snakes to ride your way to victory in this course which some have dared to call a "good snake block level."
levels.makerDescription: "I make levels." ~Shearwater, not knowing what else to write about himself

levels.briefDescription: Stealth level with Mission Impossible music
levels.description: The mushroom kingdom has been sucked into the movie "MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE". In the world of high technology, Bowser worked with his men to build a fortress equipped with state-of-the-art technologies such as detection sensors and elevators. In response, authorities appointed Bowser's foe Mario as an agent and assigned him the task of taking the fortress. They also sent this P.S. "Be careful of the detection sensors located throughout the fortress. If you show perfect stealth behavior that goes undetected, we will give you additional celebration gifts."
levels.makerDescription: ShuShuro is interested in recreating various series of games through Mario Maker. Recently, there are rumors that they are expanding their horizons to movies and attempting to create cinematic levels.

levels.briefDescription: Cape spin level
levels.description: At the heart of the goonies’ moon empire is the ancient Goonie King’s crypt. Steal King Goonie's mystic golden feather and escape!
levels.makerDescription: Mario maker oldhead who likes making cool platforming levels. Favorite platformers are Mario Sunshine, Yoshi’s Island and the DKC series.

levels.briefDescription: Captain toad level
levels.description:
A few months back, Toad Brigade were discussing how to celebrate the 10th anniversary of their legendary Sprixie Kingdom expedition. After a fierce debate, they needed a tie breaker between "some place frosty" and "some place hot". Toadette thinks of a brilliant idea, "why not both at Mount Jumpmore!"

Mount Jumpmore is a luxury ski resort, with warm, lava heated spas that are to die for! This is a pretty pricey resort though, even Luigi would think twice before coughing up the cash! Banktoad (yes seriously, that's his name!) claims he can find a great deal with his "methods" though, so against the Captain's better judgment, they book a flight with Booster Air…

Flash Forward to now, where they've arrived at their destination. Barely able to contain his excitement, Banktoad jumps into the air and explains "READY FOR VACATION!". This is where things took a turn for the worse..

The moment the poor green toad jumps, a P-switch activation is heard… and the floor beneath him disappears, causing him to fall to his doom! 

Mailtoad (seriously why are these toads named after their jobs?), being the nervous sort, long jumps to a cloud. But far from being safe, life had a different package in mind: a blaster delivered to the top of his head!

"Oh those idiots, this isn't Mount Jumpmore… it's MOUNT JUMPLESS!" screams Hint Toad (is that even a job?!)

Mount Jumpless is the notorious (and far cheaper!) mountain NEXT to Mount Jumpmore. This isn't a resort: it's a deadly set of lava infested ruins that's been claiming the souls of Toad explorers for the past 280 years! Legends say a strange flying reptile cursed a once proud civilization to misfortune whenever they jumped… and that sure seems to be in action to this day!

And yet, Toadette smiles wryly, because there's a bright side to this disaster: legends also told of the ancient civilization hiding away a wonderful flying machine, one that you don't even need to jump with! But to reach this incredible treasure, you'll need to find the 4 sacred "secret exits", and plunder the pink tokens within.

"Are you crazy Toadette?! Did you even comprehend what just happened to those two? Forget the treasure, we gotta get outta here!"

But it was no use, Toadette doesn't care about meager "dangers", she was here to make her fortune by claiming the legendary flying machine!

And that's where you come in: will you side with Toad and simply fight for survival, or will you join Toadette to find the 4 secret paths soar to the skies… WITHOUT JUMPING!
levels.makerDescription: Theorymon's a guy on the internet who plays way too much Mario, competitive Pokemon, and Touhou! When it comes to Mario Maker, he loves to make courses that challenge the idea of what it means to be Mario. This time, to celebrate the 10th anniversary of Super Mario 3D World, he made a course that pays tribute to Captain Toad, and the many ways you can play Mario without jumping!

levels.briefDescription: Thwomp spike ball dispenser
levels.description: Thwomp Industries just released their brand new Spike-Powered Improved lauNcher™, a special device which will reward Mario's timing by greatly enhancing his jumping abilities. Let's give it a test run!
levels.makerDescription: Your friendly lasagna-loving level maker! I enjoy making music levels A LOT, but lately I've started experimenting with other genres too. I love Persona 5, Oneshot, the Zelda series and -of course- Mario Maker!

levels.briefDescription: Exploration/puzzle mushroom level
levels.description: You'll need to be clever if you want to get out of the mansion alive. Explore its halls, solve its secrets, and use shapeshifting shrooms—squeeze through tight spaces and bring the house down!
levels.makerDescription: A maker who enjoys creating and playing traditional levels. He appreciates a healthy dose of exploration and secrets.

levels.briefDescription: Undertale music level
levels.description: Experience what it feels like to go on a date with Papyrus! A level for all the spaghetti lovers out there, because as the great Papyrus once said : "THAT'S RIGHT, HUMAN! YOU CAN WIN!! JUST DO WHAT I, WOULD DO... BELIEVE IN YOU!!!"
levels.makerDescription: As someone who always loved platforming games and music, Sacha found herself hooked on making Mario Maker music levels. During her time at 7MMC, none of the many music levels she attempted to build felt good enough for the event, and she instead focused on a platforming level. Which is why this year, she's going all-in with a level featuring one of her favorite themes from Undertale. Sacha also loves to occasionally create logic-based machines in Mario Maker, and her favorite artists are Jhariah and Glass Beach.

levels.briefDescription: Troll level
levels.description: Newcomer friendly troll level, one of my finest.
levels.makerDescription: Creating custom levels has been a creative outlet for me: from Portal 2 puzzle maps to coop-focused adventure maps in Terraria, I've been building stuff in video games for over a decade now. I've been focusing on Mario Maker 2 as of late because this game has the building blocks and tools to create unique experiences AND an awesome, supportive community I just love creating levels for! Over time I developed a reputation for my "simple trolls" - troll levels designed with a low barrier to entry, so they may be enjoyed by all.
